item.title: Open File Deletion
item.description: In this article i describe “open file deletion” issue and solution.

item.title: ip to location
item.description: I have developed a tool which i call it ip2loc to make a database that maps user ips to their location.

item.title: compare php syntax with golang
item.description: In this article i’m going to compare php syntax with golang. by showing how loops, making objects, lists are used in both of them. This article can be handy for any php developer who wants to learn golang.
